attributes.action: close the door on high street energy loss.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The habit of high street shops of never shutting their doors during trading hours is a criminal waste of energy. The big retailers say its because all their rivals do it, so I believe they will have to be forced into behaving responsibly by legislation. As Paul Fintoff said, "Shut that door, you energy-guzzling, retail half-wit"!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
